_xResult.title: Golden Hour Maxi Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made yellow maxi dress with feminine details
_xResult.longdesc:
Mustard (dark yellow) maxi "casual cocktail" women dress looks gorgeous and makes the silhuette slimmer. Made of premium Italian viscose fabric in a deep saffron gold color, this can be worn with layers through multiple seasons, or as a summer frock. There are lovely feminine details such as scoop neck, shirring at the high waist, pretty fabric-covered buttons on the bodice, and short sleeves.

 

  • Softly flared skirt floor length (maxi)
  • Short sleeves with semi-fitted silhouette
  • Color: yellow (mustard)
  • Fiber: 100% Viscose
  • Hidden zipper on the back

 

Specificy length if you wish something other than standard. Example for Size S (8 US), dress length is 55" (140 cm). If you specify, measure from middle of shoulder to desired length.
